net.sourceforge.nite.tools.videolabeler

Interface SelectionListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnnotationFrameFactory, TimelineFactory, ViewFrameFactory

    public interface SelectionListener

    A selection listener is notified whenever an agent or layer is selected or deselected.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void agentSelected(NAgent agent, boolean selected)
      Called when an agent is selected or deselected.
      void layerSelected(AnnotationLayer layer, boolean selected)
      Called when a layer is selected or deselected.

    • Method Detail

      • agentSelected

        void agentSelected(NAgent agent,
                 boolean selected)

        Called when an agent is selected or deselected.

        Parameters:
        agent - the agent that is selected or deselected
        selected - true if the agent is selected, false if it is deselected

      • layerSelected

        void layerSelected(AnnotationLayer layer,
                 boolean selected)

        Called when a layer is selected or deselected.

        Parameters:
        layer - the layer that is selected or deselected
        selected - true if the layer is selected, false if it is deselected
